citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05pm on April 6,
2022. The inspector called a facility representative and she stated that the family was out of the state for the week.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:05pm on April 6, 
2022.  The inspector called a facility representative and she stated that the family was out of the state for the week. 
 
 
 
End Section
